lines.text:
[finding a jar of coffee in Klemper's bag]
You're bringing instant coffee to Brazil? I won't dignify this by confiscating it!
[makes Klemper open the jar and empty it into the trash]
A woman's place is in the home... making money!
I don't think they get as much fun out of life as we do!
'Ere! You watch your tongue! Any idiot can steal. *I* been em-*bezz*-lin'!

[glances into Caesar's bag full of money, smiles]
Welcome to Brazil, senhor!

[after Patty asks what assets are]
Little female donkeys.

[Discussing his dream of a musical career]
You can't afford an orchestra and, I mean, even the baton's become prohibitive with the new tax slapped on it.
As my broker always says, the first million is always the hardest.
You are straining my credulity, my dear.
I'm in the puddin' club. I'm going to be a mother.
